copy.title: Panago Dev Awards
copy.subtitle: The good, the bad, and the ugly.

awards.title: Montreal International Poetry Prize
awards.subtitle: This award goes to the author that wrote the best JIRA ticket comment.

awards.title: Office Space
awards.subtitle: This award goes to the person who wants to destroy printers with a bat the most.

awards.title: The Jedi Award
awards.subtitle: This award goes to the Jedi who mentored the most Padawans.

awards.title: Peace in the Chaos
awards.subtitle: This award goes to the person who is the production-issue killer; raiser of children and harbinger of peace.

awards.title: Mission Impossible
awards.subtitle: This award goes to the person who beat raging deadlines in the face of newborns, COVID, and complete mayhem.

awards.title: National Geographic Photo Award
awards.subtitle: This award goes to the person who posted the most photos while aboard.

awards.title: Troublesome Test Award
awards.subtitle: This award goes to the person who slayed Tom's Java test.

awards.title: Makes my Day Award
awards.subtitle: We can't imagine a dev team without this person.

awards.title: Always in a Meeting Award
awards.subtitle: This award goes to the person who spends all their time in meetings.

awards.title: Office Parent Award (Offspring Wrangler
awards.subtitle: The person who's children make the most visual and verbal impromptu meeting cameos.

awards.title: Dashing Debut
awards.subtitle: This award goes to the person who had a dazzling debut at Panago.

awards.title: Hidden Talent Award
awards.subtitle: This award goes to the person with the surprise hidden talent.

awards.title: Walking Encyclopedia
awards.subtitle: This award goes to the most omniscient person on the team (hint: if you need to ask what omniscient is, then it probably isn't you)

awards.title: The Memer
awards.subtitle: This award goes to the person who posts the most memes.

awards.title: Bad Dad Jokes Award
awards.subtitle: This award goes to whoever tells the corniest 'jokes'.

awards.title: Globe Trotter Award
awards.subtitle: This award goes to the person who has been to the random country we decide!
